Title: Ligand-based prediction of hERG blockade
Description: A robust predictor for hERG channel blockade based on an ensemble of five deep learning models. The authors have collected a dataset from public sources, such as BindingDB and ChEMBL on hERG blockers and non-blockers. The cut-off for hERG blockade was set at IC50 < 10 uM for the classifier.
Interpretation: Probability that the compound inhibits hERG (IC50 < 10 uM)
